sentences.en: A man in camp took a barometer reading at half-hour intervals.
sentences.cn: 营地里的一个人每半小时看一次气压计。

sentences.en: Chicago PMI is also referred to as The Business Barometer tm.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥采购经理人指数也被称为商业晴雨表商标.

sentences.en: In past presidential elections, Missouri has been a barometer of the rest of the country.
sentences.cn: 在过去的总统选举中，密苏里州一直是国内其他州的晴雨表。

sentences.en: In this method, you take the barometer and walk up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 在这个方法中, 你拿着气压表,沿楼梯向上走.

sentences.en: It provides a convenient scale length for barometer.
sentences.cn: 这为气压计提供了适宜的刻度长度.

sentences.en: Mining is one of the world an important barometer of economic conditions.
sentences.cn: 矿业公司是全球经济状况的重要晴雨表.

sentences.en: Now the barometer points to rain.
Our sleep pattern is a barometer to our psychological well-being.
sentences.cn: 我们的睡眠模式是心理健康的晴雨表。

sentences.en: The arrow on the barometer was pointing to'stormy ".
sentences.cn: 气压计上的箭头指向 “ 有暴风雨 ”.

sentences.en: The barometer is falling (= showing that it will probably rain).
sentences.cn: 气压在下降（表示可能要下雨）。

sentences.en: The barometer is falling, ie Wet weather is indicated.
sentences.cn: 气压计在下降(表示天气潮湿).

sentences.en: The barometer marked a continuing fall in atmospheric pressure.
sentences.cn: 气压表表明气压在继续下降.

sentences.en: The mercury in the barometer is rising.
sentences.cn: 气压计的水银柱正在上升.

sentences.en: The skin is an accurate barometer of emotional and physical health.
sentences.cn: 皮肤是反映一个人身心健康状况的准确指标。

sentences.en: The stock market is a barometer of business.
sentences.cn: 股票市场是商业的晴雨表.

sentences.en: They are like the parakeet in the mine — they are a good barometer of what's going on.
sentences.cn: 他们就像矿区的长尾小鹦鹉,就像温度计反映出周围的变化.
